amendment.description: To require a plan to replace equipment withdrawn or diverted from the reserve components of the Armed Forces for Operation Iraqi Freedom or Operation Enduring Freedom.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4441 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4441 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Menendez. (consideration: CR S6346-6366; text: CR S6350) To require a plan to replace equipment withdrawn or diverted from the reserve components of the Armed Forces for Operation Iraqi Freedom or Operation Enduring Freedom.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4441 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4441 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Menendez.
